text: @realDonaldTrump The Governor of Maryland is an example for every Governor - he has and is taking decisive and intelligent steps to protect citizens of his State.  An incredible accomplishment of purchasing 500K COVID-19 tests on his own for Maryland.  Larry Hogan / Andrew Cuomo - true leaders!
